quote_last: And ... oh. The ironing. What am I going to do about that?
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella

quote_first: Despite the remaking of the BookWorld, some books remained tantalisingly out of reach [...] It was entirely possible that they didn't know there was a BookWorld, and still they thought they were real. A fantastic notion, until you consider that up until
quote_last: on 12 April 1948, everyone else had thought the same.
title: One of Our Thursdays is Missing
author: Jasper Fforde
